Paragraph.Text: Uses a mixture of Gold Foil, Secondary Upgrade Modules and Titanium Housings to create essential blocks.
This machine requires hoppers holding at least 3 Gold Foils, 3 Secondary Upgrade Modules and 3 Titanium Housings to start the alloying process.
